formattedAddress: 1 Centre St, New York, NY 10007, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 Centre St, New York, NY 10007, USA

originalText.text:
Today, we had a incredible day with our wonderful Big Apple Greeter, Eliot W.
Eliot took us all over Manhattan, the financial district and Brooklyn. There were parts of New York we’d never have noticed, if it wasn’t for Eliot’s expert guidance and incredible knowledge of the city, he clearly loves very much.
He’d put so much effort into our day, even before we left the UK and he made our day special and enjoyable.

text.text:
Today, we had a incredible day with our wonderful Big Apple Greeter, Eliot W.
Eliot took us all over Manhattan, the financial district and Brooklyn. There were parts of New York we’d never have noticed, if it wasn’t for Eliot’s expert guidance and incredible knowledge of the city, he clearly loves very much.
He’d put so much effort into our day, even before we left the UK and he made our day special and enjoyable.

originalText.text: We spent most of the day with Ben. He tailored a unique program for us. We learned a lot about different types of houses and life in NY on Manhattan and then we moved to Greenpoint and Williamsburg visiting at least 4 food stores each serving a unique dish and 3 breweries. We have seen places and neighborhoods we would not visit without him. He has also recommended us other places that we visited the other day and all were unique. I highly recommend to ask for a Greeter when you are visiting the NYC.

originalText.text: We enjoyed our day with Bonnie so much!!! She is a true New York expert and a lovely, warm-hearted lady. And she knows a lot when it comes to American History!!! We can highly recommend the Big Apple Greeters, it's the most unique experience to stroll around this town with a local. You see and hear things you would never have. Loved it!!!

text.text: We enjoyed our day with Bonnie so much!!! She is a true New York expert and a lovely, warm-hearted lady. And she knows a lot when it comes to American History!!! We can highly recommend the Big Apple Greeters, it's the most unique experience to stroll around this town with a local. You see and hear things you would never have. Loved it!!!

originalText.text: We met Miriam today and she was the perfect introduction to the city. She immediately put you at ease and we felt like family by the end of the day! She had a structure for the afternoon but was open to take us to where we were interested in going. She was a wealth of knowledge and answered all our tourist questions with good grace! I feel much more comfortable navigating the city now and we got a few big tourist “must do’s” ticked off in the one afternoon too. I couldn’t recommend this service enough and Miriam too.

originalText.text: Highly recommend this experience!  As family of 5 with elementary school kids, we met up with Greeter Bonnie to visit the Upper West side and had a great time.  We wanted a local NYC experience. Based on the rest of our NYC itinerary, Bonnie showed us a part of NYC that we would have never seen.  For 3.5 hours, we walked the neighborhood streets and parks, absorbed the energy and history of NYC, and learned about the life experience of a New Yorker. We felt that Boonie helped us see a tiny bit of the real New York City.  Loved it!
